Class CounterDAO

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • persistCounter

        public static void persistCounter(Counter counter)
        Persists a counter objects to the database
        Parameters:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String issn,
                        int year,
                        int month,
                        javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
        checks, whether a specific Counter object is in the database
        Parameters:
        issn - the ISSN of the journal to be checked
        year - the year of the COUNTER statistics
        month - the month of the COUNTER statistics
        em - the entity manager for the database
        Returns:
        boolean true, if the database contains the desired COUNTER statistics

      • getSingleCounter

        public static Counter getSingleCounter(java.lang.String issn,
                                       int year,
                                       int month,
                                       javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
        retrieves a single Counter object from the database
        Parameters:
        issn - the ISSN of the journal to be checked
        year - the year of the COUNTER statistics
        month - the month of the COUNTER statistics
        em - the entity manager for the database
        Returns:
        Counter the desired COUNTER statistics. Returns null if the statistics is not found or more than one exist.

                                                         javax.persistence.EntityManager em)

        Parameters:
        issn - the ISSN of the journal to be checked
        year - the year of the COUNTER statistics
        em - the entity manager for the database
        Returns:
        the desired COUNTER statistics. Returns null if the statistics is not found.

        issn - the ISSN of the journal to be checked
        year - the year of the COUNTER statistics
        em - the entity manager for the database
        Returns:
        long the total number of successful requests
